original_text: Jahath was the chief, and Zizah the second; but Jeush and Beriah did not have many sons, therefore they became counted as a single father's house.
korean_text: 그 우두머리는 야핫이요 그 다음은 시사며 여우스와 브리아는 아들이 많지 아니하므로 그들과 한 조상의 가문으로 계수되었더라

sentences.original_text: but Jeush and Beriah did not have many sons
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 여우스와 베리아는 아들이 많지 않았으므로

sentences.original_text: therefore they became counted as a single father's house
